title.rendered: “Remembering IDF Heroes: Details of Four Recent Casualties and Injured Soldiers in Gaza Strip Battles”

content.rendered:
Attached is a message from the IDF spokesperson regarding the names of four IDF casualties whose notification has been delivered to their families: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC09012024ERJVBNIUFDBVIBU

Attached is a link to the IDF website, where their details and photos of the casualties are published and updated: https://www.idf.il/59780

In the battle in which Maj. (res.) David Schwartz may his memory be a blessing, and Maj. (res.) Yekir Hakst may his memory be a blessing, fell, a reservist from the 8219 Engineering Battalion, Operation ‘Half of Fire’ (551), was seriously injured.

Also, in the battle in which Maj. (res.) Gabriel Blum may his memory be a blessing fell, a combatants officer and two combatants from the engineering unit of Brigade 36 were seriously injured.

Furthermore, two reserve officers in the 646 Brigade were seriously injured in a battle in the center of the Gaza Strip

The combatants were evacuated for medical treatment in the hospital and their families were updated.
